pages.text: $(li)The Slimeball is a sticky material that can be used to craft $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/slime_block)Green Slime Blocks$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/magma_cream)Magma Creams$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/supplementaries/slingshot)Slingshots$(/l), $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/sticky_piston)Sticky Pistons$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/lead)Leads$(/l), and the $(l:patchouli:armors/slime_armor)Slime Armor$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/slime)Slimes$(/l) may drop this item upon death.
